channel.title: Practical Examples on UEB cluster usage tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in Practical Examples on UEB cluster usage tutorial

item.title: Singularity: Quasi-mapping RNA-Seq quantification
item.description: The use of Singularity containers is supported in the cluster. In contrast to other container technologies, Singularity is a good fit to HPC environments, since: Singularity containers don’t need administrative privileges to be executed. Performance levels are very close to regular binaries. Compatibility with Docker images, which enables the use of a huge number of readily available existing containerized tools. Container building tools similar to Docker. Users can build custom containers using already acquired general principles.
